entry.content: Image: Toge Productions Proceeds from this pride-themed bundle benefit the Trevor Project Humble is currently offering a handful of excellent, narrative-driven titles featuring LGBTQ characters in honor of Pride Month. entry.content: Graphic: Polygon | Source Images: Nintendo Nintendo‚Äôs leading ladies are getting the shot they deserve Princess Zelda will be a playable protagonist in a mainline Legend of Zelda game in The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom. entry.content: Photo: Impolite Productions Louise Sugden and Chris ‚ÄòPeachy‚Äô Peach star in Heretic Hunt The Dungeons & Dragons actual play space is jam-packed with heroes wielding swords and casting spells, kicking ass and taking names in vaguely medieval settings.
